reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having lived in the area previously we were struggling to find somewhere to stay before we came across the website for Lanes. The picutre of the hotel doesn't really show it very well and it is much more impressive that it looks on there.
reviews.title: A pleasant surprise

likes.disliked: — Less than enthusiastic front of house staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the penthouse and were impressed by the size and the quality of the decor and furnishings. It was a bit warm being in the roof on a hot summer's night, but not so hot it kept us awake - it just would have been nice to have a sheet rather than a duvet.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel and fantastic service

likes.disliked: — The room temperature- a bit too stuffy

reviews.text: The complimentary mini-bar was a nice touch, and the bathroom was stocked with toiletries and bathrobes. The standalone bath was lovely along with the large shower cubicle and powerful shower.
reviews.title: Facade Retention

likes.liked: — The whole Lanes Experience and ....... the ducks!
